intro: Crotalaria dura, commonly known as the hard crotalaria, is a species of flowering plant in the family Fabaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa and is characterized by its distinctive yellow flowers and compound leaves. The plant has a robust, erect stem and produces small, pod-like fruits that contain several seeds. It is often found in dry, open habitats and is adapted to withstand arid conditions. Crotalaria dura is also noted for its nitrogen-fixing ability, which makes it useful in soil enrichment.
